titles.title: Honoring the life and accomplishments of Kurt Vonnegut, Jr. and extending the condolences of the House of Representatives to his family on the occasion of his death.
Honoring the life and accomplishments of Kurt Vonnegut, Jr. and extending the condolences of the House of Representatives to his family on the occasion of his death.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Extends condolences to the family of Kurt Vonnegut Jr. (author of the novel "Slaughterhouse Five") on the occasion of his death.
